SELECT t.id, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName, t.update_date as updateDate, t.delflag as delflag, t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.tend_id as tendId, t.title as title, t.title_pic as titlePic, t.code as code, t.doc_content as docContent, t.author_id as authorId, t.author as author, t.importance as importance, t.keywords as keywords, t.doc_desc as docDesc, t.publish_date as publishDate, t.status as status, t.hit_num as hitNum, t.belong_dept_id as belongDeptId, t.belong_dept_name as belongDeptName, t.belong_company_id as belongCompanyId, t.belong_company_name as belongCompanyName, t.content_type_id as contentTypeId, t.content_child_id as contentChildId, t.stick as stick, t.stick_cycle as stickCycle, t.stick_invalid_time as stickInvalidTime, t.sort_num as sortNum, t.process_instance_id as processInstanceId, t.business_object_code as businessObjectCode, t.fl_code as flCode, t.relation_id as relationId, t.big_version as bigVersion, t.minor_version as minorVersion
FROM oa_content_row_type t WHERE t.delflag = 0 and t.content_type_id = #{contentTypeId} and t.content_child_id = #{contentChildId} and t.id != #{id} AND t.relation_id != #{relationId} and t.status = #{status} GROUP BY relation_id order by big_version desc,minor_version desc

SELECT t.id, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName, t.update_date as updateDate, t.delflag as delflag, t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.tend_id as tendId, t.title as title, t.title_pic as titlePic, t.code as code, t.doc_content as docContent, t.author_id as authorId, t.author as author, t.importance as importance, t.keywords as keywords, t.doc_desc as docDesc, t.publish_date as publishDate, t.status as status, t.hit_num as hitNum, t.belong_dept_id as belongDeptId, t.belong_dept_name as belongDeptName, t.belong_company_id as belongCompanyId, t.belong_company_name as belongCompanyName, t.content_type_id as contentTypeId, t.content_child_id as contentChildId, t.stick as stick, t.stick_cycle as stickCycle, t.stick_invalid_time as stickInvalidTime, t.sort_num as sortNum, t.process_instance_id as processInstanceId, t.business_object_code as businessObjectCode, t.fl_code as flCode, t.relation_id as relationId, t.big_version as bigVersion, t.minor_version as minorVersion
FROM oa_content_row_type t WHERE t.code = #{code} and t.id != #{id} and t.delflag = 0

SELECT t.attribute_value as attributeValue, t.status as status,
t0.id as contentChildId, t0.name as contentChildName, t0.code as contentChildCode, t0.full_id_path as fullIdPath, t0.full_path as fullIdName,
t1.name as contentTypeName, t1.code as contentTypeCode, t1.content_type as contentType, t1.business_object as businessObject, t1.approval_process as approvalProcess, t1.news_type as newsType FROM oa_content_row_type t LEFT JOIN oa_content_child t0 ON t.content_child_id = t0.id LEFT JOIN oa_content_type t1 ON t.content_type_id=t1.id WHERE 1=1
AND t.id = #{id}

SELECT t.code FROM oa_content_row_type t WHERE t.code_type = #{codeType} AND t.code LIKE concat('%',#{year},'%') ORDER BY REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(t.code,#{codeType},''),'号',''),'〔',''),'〕','')*1 DESC LIMIT 0,1
